projects.title: Dynamic File Management System
projects.description: **Challenge:** Built a centralized file management system to replace scattered file storage across multiple platforms. **Solution:** Architected a full-stack application with Laravel REST APIs and React frontend, implementing secure authentication, real-time search, multi-file operations, and responsive design. **Impact:** Delivered a production-ready system with optimized performance across devices and streamlined file workflows.

projects.title: Asset Management
projects.description: **Challenge:** Organizations struggled to track equipment and inventory across departments, leading to lost assets and inefficient resource allocation. **Solution:** Built a full-stack Laravel application with real-time tracking, role-based access control, and an intuitive admin panel using Tailwind CSS. **Impact:** Created a scalable system enabling organizations to monitor assets, reduce losses, and make data-driven resource decisions.

projects.title: MealVista ‚Äì Recipe Search App
projects.description: **Challenge:** Home cooks needed a fast, intuitive way to discover recipes with ingredients and cooking instructions. **Solution:** Developed a responsive Vue.js application integrating third-party recipe APIs, featuring real-time search, video tutorials, and clean UI with Tailwind CSS. **Impact:** Delivered a production-ready app with seamless mobile experience, deployed on Vercel with optimized performance.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: **Challenge:** Small businesses needed an affordable, feature-complete online store to compete in digital commerce. **Solution:** Built a full-stack e-commerce platform with Laravel backend, featuring product catalog, cart system, secure checkout, order tracking, and comprehensive admin dashboard for inventory, coupons, and user management. **Impact:** Delivered a scalable solution with 10+ core features, enabling businesses to launch online stores without expensive enterprise platforms.
